text: There is a lot of deleted posts in helpdesk in the last 48 hours. Is that normal?

elements.text: There is a lot of deleted posts in helpdesk in the last 48 hours. Is that normal?

text:
This is referred to as the infamous Slack hole :hole:

The free Slack maintains only 10,000 messages so when we have close to 9K members, we can blow through 10K messages pretty quickly.

elements.text: This is referred to as the infamous Slack hole
The free Slack maintains only 10,000 messages so when we have close to 9K members, we can blow through 10K messages pretty quickly.

text: That is one reason the new bot was introduced, i.e. to encourage people to post questions on Discourse instead.

text: Some people, like me, actually like the ephemeral nature of <#C6A044SQH|helpdesk>

Yes, there was quite an amount of intentionally deleted first posts. I thought it was surprising.
Nothing important I guess, probably the magic of statistics, some situations will occur eventually
